scripts.qmake-arm: ~/Qt/6.9.3/macos/bin/qmake '../../app/app.pro' -spec macx-clang QMAKE_APPLE_DEVICE_ARCHS='x86_64 arm64' CONFIG+=qtquickcompiler && make qmake_all
scripts.build-mac-intel-binaries-qmake: npm run build-mac-intel-qmake && npm run sign-and-package
scripts.build-mac-intel-qmake: npm run qmake-intel && npm run make && npm run macdeploy
scripts.build-mac-arm-binaries-qmake: npm run build-mac-arm-qmake && npm run sign-and-package
scripts.build-mac-arm-qmake: npm run qmake-arm && npm run make && npm run macdeploy
scripts.sign-and-package: cp Info.plist 'Video simili duplicate cleaner.app/Contents/Info.plist' && npm run sign-app && npm run package-app
scripts.sign-app: codesign --deep --force --sign 'Apple Distribution: THEOPHANE MAYAUD (XZ4FY5SXW7)' --entitlements parent.plist --options=runtime --timestamp 'Video simili duplicate cleaner.app'
scripts.package-app: productbuild --component 'Video simili duplicate cleaner.app' /Applications --sign '3rd Party Mac Developer Installer: THEOPHANE MAYAUD (XZ4FY5SXW7)' --timestamp 'Video simili duplicate cleaner.pkg'
scripts.clean-leftovers-qmake: npm run qmake-clean && rm -f 'Video simili duplicate cleaner.dmg' && rm -f Makefile && rm -f .qmake.stash && rm -f -r 'Video simili duplicate cleaner.app' && rm -f 'Video simili duplicate cleaner.pkg'
scripts.clean-qmake: npm run qmake-clean && npm run clean-leftovers-qmake
